**Request for Proposal: Silicon (Si) Charge Coupled Device (CCD) Camera**

**Reference:** PW-22-01015194
**Solicitation Number:** 22-58094
**Publication Date:** November 29, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 15, 2022

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is soliciting proposals for the supply of a Silicon (Si) Charge Coupled Device (CCD) camera for optical spectroscopy. The instrument will be used in the quantum physics laboratory for the characterization of quantum materials and nanostructures.

The proposed camera shall be able to operate in the visible and near IR spectral range. It shall be capable of characterizing quantum materials and nanostructures such as GaAs-AlGaAs heterostructures and Van der Waals heterostructures, as well as quantum dots and other electronic quantum circuits.

**Pre-qualification:** Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to bid. Suppliers interested in participating shall download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

**Trade Agreements:** The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Geographic Location:** The successful supplier shall deliver the camera to the NRC's location in the National Capital Region (NCR), Canada.
